nodes.bodyText: Why not plain Response as a return type?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,24 @@ *
  • {@link ResourceInfo} *
  • {@link SimpleResourceInfo} * + * + * The return type of the method must be either be of type {@code void}, {@code Optional}, {@code Uni} or + * {@code Uni}. + *
      + *
    • {@code void} should be used when filtering does not need to perform any blocking operations and the filter cannot abort + * processing. + *
    • {@code Optional} should be used when filtering does not need to perform any blocking operations but the filter

nodes.bodyText:
Good question. I thought of making it Optional because a filter doesn't have to return it, so I thought I'd make it explicit.
But we can of course support it, it's no big deal.

    • {@code Optional} should be used when filtering does not need to perform any blocking operations but the filter

nodes.bodyText: I'd support both, if returning a Response and it's null then it's a no-abort case.
